title: Eyebrows and eyelashes
summary: Eyebrow shaping and coloring. Eyelash extensions, treatments and coloring.
description:
#### Variety of techniques and effects

Fancy natural eyelashes that look natural? Or would you rather prefer Hollywood volume? Whatever your preference is, our experts are able to make it happen.

#### Safety means quality materials

We only use the best non-toxic professional materials and high quality tools. Our experts will perform tests for allergic reactions before the procedure.

#### Individual approach

We take the eye shape, colour and other unique features, as well as style of each client into account, helping to reveal and emphasise the natural beauty.

#### Enhancing natural eyelashes

Lengthening and adding volume to natural eyelashes through the process of lamination. The look becomes more expressive, eyelashes look thicker and longer - no need for daily makeup.
